AppDB.Name: PLL1_STATUS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table allows to check the lock status of PLLs of type PLL1

AppDB.Name: PLL3_STATUS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table allows to check the lock status of PLLs of type PLL3

AppDB.Name: PLL1_CFG
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table allows to configure PLLs of type PLL1

Field.Name: CH_0_MDIV
Field.Description: PLL configuration - Divider ratio of the post-divider channel 0.

Field.Name: CH_1_MDIV
Field.Description: PLL configuration - Divider ratio of the post-divider channel 1.

Field.Name: CH_2_MDIV
Field.Description: PLL configuration - Divider ratio of the post-divider channel 2.

Field.Name: CH_3_MDIV
Field.Description: PLL configuration - Divider ratio of the post-divider channel 3.

Field.Name: CH_4_MDIV
Field.Description: PLL configuration - Divider ratio of the post-divider channel 4.

Field.Name: CH_5_MDIV
Field.Description: PLL configuration - Divider ratio of the post-divider channel 5.

Field.Name: CH_HOLD
Field.Description: PLL configuration - Hold the output of individual post-divider channel 5 to 0. For the corresponding channel, 0 = normal operation, 1 = hold the output level to 0.

Field.Name: CH_MDEL
Field.Description: PLL configuration - Output delay control of post-divider. Each toggling of this control will delay the output clock by 1 DCO cycle.

Field.Name: DCO_BYPASS
Field.Description: PLL configuration - DCO bypass control value in open-loop mode of PLL. 0x0000 = minimum Fdco within the range ... 0xffff = maximum Fdco within the range.

Field.Name: DCO_BYPASS_EN
Field.Description: PLL configuration. - Enabling of DCO bypass mode, or PLL open-loop mode. 0 = normal operation, 1 = bypass enabled

Field.Name: DIV2_DIV4_ON
Field.Description: PLL configuration - Pre-divider control of the DCO clock. 0 = Fdco is one half of the LC oscillator frequency, 1 = Fdco is one quarter of the LC oscillator frequency.

Field.Name: KI
Field.Description: PLL configuration - Integrator gain control of the PLL digital filter. Recommended value range is 0 to 4 for the purpose of PLL stability.

Field.Name: KP
Field.Description: PLL configuration - Proportional gain control of the PLL , digital filter. Recommended value range is 4 to 11 for the purpose of PLL stability.

Field.Name: LDO_ANALOG
Field.Description: PLL configuration - Output level control of PLL internal LDOs. controls the analog LDO level, Each word segment has the following effect on the corresponding LDO level: 00 = 1.0V 01 = 1.05V 10 = 0.90V 11 = 0.95V.

Field.Name: NDIV_INT
Field.Description: PLL configuration - Feedback divider ratio of the PLL. Let Fdco be the DCO frequency, and fref be the reference frequency. There is following relationship. Fdco = ndiv_int * Fref / pdiv.

Field.Name: POST_HOLD_ALL
Field.Description: PLL configuration - Hold the output of all post-divider channels. 0 = normal operation , 1 = hold the output of all post-dividers.

Field.Name: POST_RST_HOLD_SEL
Field.Description: PLL configuration - Reset mode of the post-divider. i_post_resetb will be ANDed with the internal post-divider reset control, which can be set to the following values, 00 = lock, PLL phase locking indicator, 01 = flock, PLL frequency locking indicator, 10 = resetb, PLL digital control reset.

Field.Name: STAT_MODE
Field.Description: PLL configuration - Mode selection of digital controller's internal status. 00 = unused, 01 = Measurement of min and max phase error, 10 = unused, 11 = measurement of min and max dco control.

Field.Name: STAT_RESET
Field.Description: PLL configuration - Reset control of the digital controller's internal status read-out. 0 = internal status read-out enabled, 1 = internal status read-out disabled.

Field.Name: STAT_SELECT
Field.Description: PLL configuration - Stat_select Selection of the digital controller's internal status for read-out. 000,110,111 = unused, 001 = minimum value based on stat_mode selection, 010 = maximum value based on stat_mode selection, 011 = Misc. PLL lock status, 100 = DCO fine DAC control code, 101 = DCO coarse DAC control code.

Field.Name: STAT_UPDATE
Field.Description: PLL configuration - Toggle this bit to update the internal status read-out.

Field.Name: SW_OVERRIDE
Field.Description: PLL configuration - If set, configuration is enabled.

AppDB.Name: PLL3_CFG
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table allows to configure PLLs type PLL3

Field.Name: CH_0_MDIV
Field.Description: PLL configuration - Divider ratio of the post-divider channel 0.

Field.Name: CH_1_MDIV
Field.Description: PLL configuration - Divider ratio of the post-divider channel 1.

Field.Name: CH_2_MDIV
Field.Description: PLL configuration - Divider ratio of the post-divider channel 2.

Field.Name: CH_3_MDIV
Field.Description: PLL configuration - Divider ratio of the post-divider channel 3.

Field.Name: CH_4_MDIV
Field.Description: PLL configuration - Divider ratio of the post-divider channel 4.

Field.Name: CH_5_MDIV
Field.Description: PLL configuration - Divider ratio of the post-divider channel 5.

Field.Name: HOLD_ALL
Field.Description: PLL configuration - Hold the output of all post-divider channels. 0 = normal operation , 1 = hold the output of all post-dividers .

Field.Name: NDIV_INT
Field.Description: PLL configuration - Feedback divider ratio of the PLL. Let Fdco be the DCO frequency, and fref be the reference frequency. There is following relationship. Fdco = ndiv_int * Fref / pdiv .

Field.Name: PDIV
Field.Description: PLL configuration - Pre-divider ratio of the reference clock.

Field.Name: STAT_MODE
Field.Description: PLL configuration - Mode selection of digital controller's internal status. 00 = unused, 01 = Measurement of min and max phase error, 10 = unused, 11 = measurement of min and max dco control .

Field.Name: STAT_RESET
Field.Description: PLL configuration - Reset control of the digital controller's internal status read-out. 0 = internal status read-out enabled, 1 = internal status read-out disab.

Field.Name: STAT_SELECT
Field.Description: PLL configuration - stat_select Selection of the digital controller's internal status for read-out. 000,110,111 = unused, 001 = minimum value based on stat_mode selection, 010 = maximum value based on stat_mode selection, 011 = Misc. PLL lock status, 100 = DCO fine DAC control code, 101 = DCO coarse DAC control code .

Field.Name: STAT_UPDATE
Field.Description: PLL configuration - Toggle this bit to update the internal status read-out.

Field.Name: SW_OVERRIDE
Field.Description: PLL configuration - If set, configuration is enabled.

AppDB.Name: SYNCE_PLL_CFG
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table allows to configure SYNCE PLLs

Field.Name: SYNCE_PLL_POST_RESETB
Field.Description: PLL reset for ALL post-divider channels.

AppDB.Name: SYNCE_PLL_STATUS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table is used for storing the SyncE PLL status.

Field.Name: SYNCE_PLL_LOCK
Field.Description: If asserted, indicates that the Master SyncE PLL is locked.

Field.Name: PLL_STATUS_BITS
Field.Description: Threshold used for enabling the Squelch function.

Field.Name: PLL_LOCK_LOST
Field.Description: Threshold used for disabling the Squelch function.

AppDB.Name: PLL_CMIC_TIMESTAMP_CONFIG_SEL
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Use to select the timestamp configuration

AppDB.Name: PLL_CMIC_TIMESTAMP_CONFIG
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table handle the cmic timestamp configuration
